2a1(mdo sde): // 'alo brgyad pa nas byang ba chos kyi rnam grangs thog
2a2(mdo sde): gis thos pa'i dus gcig no/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod
2b1(mdo sde): na rgyal du rgyal byed kyi rol mgon ldang zas sbyin gyi kun dgazur
2b2(mdo sde): ban/ dge slong lo brgya tsal gyi dge slong gang go 'du chen
2b3(mdo sde): dnga' sems dnga' ched de rdo rje sgra dbyings dang / byang chub
3a1(mdo sde): ngag mchog dang / blo gas mtha' yas dang / dri med snying po dang
3a2(mdo sde): ye shes rgya la dang / mtha' yas su/ dang / ye shes
3a3(mdo sde): snang ba dang / ye shes sbyin ma dang / shes rab snang ba dang / tshangs
3a4(mdo sde): pas byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems ji pa' chen po lnga'i
3b1(mdo sde): cod pan dang / de dag dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang che ba
3b2(mdo sde): dbang che bar gags pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
3b3(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bus su rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar
3b4(mdo sde): phyogs logasu 'dzag rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ste/ de 'das pa na/ 'jig
3b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod / de nad bzhin gshe
3b6(mdo sde): pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan shin tu yongs bsgrags
4a1(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// 
4a2(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legasuM 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
4a3(mdo sde): 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthong dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhi na ga shogs pa
4a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saM sa rgyas kun tu snang zhes bya ba da ltar yang
4a5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'a zhing gzhes la chos kyang ste na te// shA rI'i bu sadzes rgyas kyi zhing
4a6(mdo sde): 'di nas shar phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed dngangs pa
4a7(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba yod da/ ngan
4b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing
4b2(mdo sde): bzhes la ches kyang sten to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyid 'das pa na/ 'jig
4b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogaso ba'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i
4b4(mdo sde): rtog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po zhes bya bang ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la tshe sa kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
4b5(mdo sde): nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ jig rten gyi khams rdul bral tshogs shes bya ba yod
4b6(mdo sde): de de ni ngo bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas pa snang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang
4b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das
4b8(mdo sde): pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams slu ba meng pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs par med
5a1(mdo sde): par stan pa'i dpa' zhes bya ba ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gnas la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar
5a2(mdo sde): phyogs legs su sangs rgyas kyi ning gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye bo snad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gsar gyi tshogs shes bya ba yed de/ de na de bzhin
5a3(mdo sde): goshags pa dgra pacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma la rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'a
5a4(mdo sde): zhing gnas la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs legs su 'jig rteran gyi khams gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi
5a5(mdo sde): bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skrang byings snyad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na ba/ zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
5a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma la rab tu gnas po r-i dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba nga ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang sten to// shA
5a7(mdo sde): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag ni/ yongs su dag pa ste/ bud med
5a8(mdo sde): med do// snyigs ma lnga med do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig/ de bzhin gshegs
5b1(mdo sde): ngadagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ len cing 'dzin la klog cing kun chub par byed de// 'jug par byed
5b2(mdo sde): cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mong sems can dmyal por 'gro ba'am// drong
5b3(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dwags kyi yul lam/ lho ma yin rnams kyi nang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de/ go skabs ma yin no// mi khom
5b4(mdo sde): pa rnams su skye ba de'i gnas med do// shA ri'i bu bud med kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
5b5(mdo sde): gi mtshan thos nas/ blangs shing gzung la/ blags shing kun chub par byas te/ 'ju/ ga par byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya
5b6(mdo sde): cher yang dag par rig par rab tu bshad na/ shA ri'i bu de bud myed kyi dngos po lon gnyis len pa'i gnas ngo med cing go skabs ma yin te/ nga'i
5b7(mdo sde): gnas med do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mi theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshugs
5b8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas blangs shing bzung la/ blags shing kun chub par byas te/ 
6a1(mdo sde): 'jug par byas shing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
6a2(mdo sde): mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon che las 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o// 
6a3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me theg pa chen po la yang dag por zhugs pa gang la la nig gis/ de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang
6a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjod de/ nub me sred la nyal na de bde bar gnyid kyi ldog par 'gyur/ dade brla sad par 'gyur zhing / 
6a5(mdo sde): sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmi bar mi 'gyur te/ ngag nyid kyis log pa na yang lha rnamasasrung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
6a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu me theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
6a7(mdo sde): rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjed nas/ mtshan me the rangs 'jig rten pa'i bya ba rnams rtsom na/ 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// shA
6a8(mdo sde): ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
6b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ len cing 'dzin la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ 'jug par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya
6b2(mdo sde): cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi bar du nam yang mngon par shes pa dang bral b.ro mi 'gyur/ nam yang gzungs
6b3(mdo sde): dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang dbang po ma mtshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang mtshan dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang shes rab shin tu rgyas pa dang bral
6b4(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de'adi
6b5(mdo sde): nas brdung ste/ byang chub kyi bar du nam yang shes rab phun sum tshogs pa shin tu brgya sa pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
6b6(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// 'jig rten mge/ 
6b7(mdo sde): po 'di dag go// mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa// de ni ngan 'gro kun bzlog nas// ring por mi thogs bde 'gror 'gre/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par
6b8(mdo sde): byed de'i sems ni dang bar 'gyur/ rtag tu 'jig rten mgon mthing nas// mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal
7a1(mdo sde): pa bye ba grangs med du/ de ni 'du ba'i sgo snyed cing // de ni rtag tu bkur bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba
7a2(mdo sde): grangs med du// lha rnams kyis ni rtag tu mched// myur du byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de ni shes rab 'chal po 'am/ 
7a3(mdo sde): blun pa 'am 'an par yeng mi 'gyur// kun tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan pa// de lo lnga klu gnod sbyin dang / gsang ba lnga dang
7a4(mdo sde): lho mi ni rnams// nyin dang mtshan du srung bar byed// ma tshan rnams 'di dag rjes/ dra ni gzugs mtshan phud sum tshigs// 'byer pa'i rigs su skye
7a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing // de ni sbyin pa'i bdag par 'gyur// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pas// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang du// de yi kha nas dri
7a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba// dri bsang zhing po 'byung bar 'gyur// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// rdzu 'phrul che zhing yid gzungs lo// 'dod ma bye ba steng ldan pa'i
7a7(mdo sde): rin chen pad+mar skye bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// pa dang ma dang rtsa lag dang // spun rnams kyi ni yid 'ong zhing // nam
7a8(mdo sde): yang 'phengs pa mthong mi 'gyur// bud med kyis kyang blo ldan pa// de dag rnams kyi mtshan zes na// bud mod lus la yid thung nas// mkhas shing / 
7b1(mdo sde): skyes par skye bar 'gyur// lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir// myur du byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi// rten dang skabs su
7b2(mdo sde): 'azung b.ro 'gyur// de la mtshan gyis mi tshugs to// dug gis mi tshugs mes ma yin// g.yon can dag dang chom rkun dang // rgyal po 'am do la
7b3(mdo sde): gnod mi byed// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// de la sdig dang ldan pa'i bdud// nag po'i rtsa lag bzhin bcas pas// glags ni rnyed par yong mi
7b4(mdo sde): 'gyur// ning rnams bye ba bsam yas su// de ni mtha' las 'gre gyur te// phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing / dngar ni// 'jig rten mgon po rnams la lha/ 
7b5(mdo sde): brtan pa sangs rgyas rnams mthong nas// dad pa brtan po// thob par 'gyur// de yi bsam pa mkhyen nas su// mi mchog rnams ni lung ston to// 
7b6(mdo sde): thub pa rnams las mngon sum bdag/ byang chub lung bstan thos nas su// rtag tu dga' dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de ni dogs pa med par 'gyur/ 
7b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa gang zhig mtshan 'di dag/ thos nas rab tu 'dzin byed pa// de ni yon tan 'di dag dang // rgya chen gzhan yang les kyang 'thob/ 
7b8(mdo sde): thub pa drang srong che gyur pa// 'di dag rnams kyi mtshan thos nas// mi gang mtshan rnams 'dzin byed pa// rdzu 'phrul tshe mkhas bsod
8a1(mdo sde): rnabs 'dod// de lta ngas na bdag nyid de// de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos na// skyes bu bakhas pas gzungag zhing // gzhan dag la ni bshad
8a2(mdo sde): bar bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang
8a3(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa
8a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya man dzu shrI di krI ri ti nI ma ma hA yA na sU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
8a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes pang zag pa chen po'i mdo// // dam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / ngang chung sems dpa' thams cad la dag
8a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khang na/ d+ya rgod kyi phung po'i ri li/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po/ 
8a7(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad steng dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu me// gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba
8a8(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa zhig 'dug ste/ bu mo de yang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus/ lus kyi mdog gser gyi
8b1(mdo sde): kha dog lta bur mngon par grub par gyur cing / sa'i phyogs gang dag du 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'gro ba'i sa phyogs de dag kyang / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/ 
8b2(mdo sde): des gos dmar po 'am/ gang dag gyon par gyur pa'i gos de dag thams cad kyang / gser gyi kha dog lta bu nyid du snang ngo // bu mo de yang skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la dga' zhing yid
8b3(mdo sde): gcugs pa dang / blta bas mi ngoms shing / bka' blo bde la/ nges pa dang / 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang / dga' bar snga zhing / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / 
8b4(mdo sde): khro gnyer med pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang bar gyur pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams dang / blon po'i bu gzhon nu rnams dang
8b5(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu gzhon nu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi du gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / de la shin tu chags shing yid 'brang bar gyur te// lta bas chog mi shes so// smad 'tsheng ma'i/ 
8b6(mdo sde): bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de bskyes mos tshal lam/ 'bab chu 'am/ rdzing du 'am/ khyim 'am/ lam che'am/ grong bar ram/ gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de
8b7(mdo sde): ngag tu/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po rnams kyang shin tu ltang mor gyur nas/ kun 'dus te de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro'o// de nas smang 'tshong ma'i bu mo
8b8(mdo sde): gser mchog 'od dpal de tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bas/ nor gyis glas te/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung nas rta bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / 
9a1(mdo sde): de rgyu dang / gserang kyis legs par brgyad pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal batshan dang / bden bsgre zhing / me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / spos dang / byes dang
9a2(mdo sde): me tog 'phreng gis mdzes par byas pa/ me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng bas skar khung byas pa'i nang du stan bzang po bshams pa la 'dug nas/ 'di ltar rtse zhing dga' ba'i bsam pas shing rta de'i mdun
9a3(mdo sde): du ni/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdo ba dang / glu dbyangs len pa dag gis drangs/ shing rta de'i phyi bzhin du nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spang pa thogs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang la/ skye bo'i tshigs chen
9a4(mdo sde): po ltad mo lta ba'i bsam pa can dag kyang / phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur cing / skyed res tshal gyi sar dong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ nang du yang dag 'dzeg las
9a5(mdo sde): langs te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyes nas/ 'di snyam du sems te su zhig rdzu 'phrul gyi ro 'brul lam/ kun brjed pa'i cho 'phrul lam/ rjes su
9a6(mdo sde): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can gang / theg pa chen po 'di la yongasu smin par bya snyam pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ smad 'tshong pa'i bu po gser
9a7(mdo sde): mchog 'od dpal tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang / lhan cig tu shing rta la zhon te/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'dul ba'i phyir de'i dbang po dang stobs dang / 
9a8(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi bye brag la rnam par bltas nas/ de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing / chos kun shes par bya ba'i nus pa dang / mthu dang skal ba yod par rig nas/ de nas de'i tshe 'jam
9b1(mdo sde): dpal gzhon du gyur pas 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba/ mngon par 'du byas te/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byas pas/ 'di ltar rang gi lus bstanas thag tu
9b2(mdo sde): nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od kyang zil du rlag par byed na/ sems can gzhan dag gi lha spos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bur rang gi lus rnam par sprul nas/ gos gang gi 'od kyis dpag tshad gcig
9b3(mdo sde): tsam gyi khor yug snang bas/ snang bar byed pa'i gos de lta bu yang lus la gyon par kun tu ston to// rang gi lus rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par yang bstan to// de nas 'jam dpal
9b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas/ lus la gos dang / brgyan thams ca dkyis legs par brgyan nas/ lam gang nas srad 'tshong ma 'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'ong ba'i lam de'i mdun
9b5(mdo sde): log su bsdad do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas der bsdad ma thag tu/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de'i shing rta yang rma gsog por gyur/ srad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog
9b6(mdo sde): 'od dpal gyi lus thams cad kyang mog sog por gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu chu ngo'i gser gyi drung du snag tsha'i yug bzhag na/ lam per mi 'dug/ lhan ner mi 'dug/ 
9b7(mdo sde): lhang nger mi 'dug go// de bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus kyi 'od kyi 'od kyis reg pa na/ bu mo de'i lus kyang lam mer mi 'dug/ lhang nger mi 'dug go// smad 'tsheng ma'i bu mo
9b8(mdo sde): gser mchog 'od dpal gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu gzhon nu ltar 'dug la/ lus la rgyan gyis brgyan cing / gsal ba'i gos legs par gyon la/ gos de las kyang
10a1(mdo sde): 'od 'byung bar mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de bdag gi lus la brnyas pa'i 'du shes dang / dman pa'i 'du shes skyes shing / gos de la yang mngon par 'dod
10a2(mdo sde): pa dang / gzung ba'i 'du shes skyes nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'dis mchog gis/ bdag shing rta 'di las babs la 'di dang lhan cig tu dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / 
10a3(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyad la/ gos 'di yang bslang bar bya'o snyam mo// bu mo des de lta bu'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ rgyal po chen
10a4(mdo sde): po rnams thos kyi bus bdag nyid mi'i gzugasu mngon par sprul nas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod skyes bu dam pa 'di la kun tu chags pa'i sems ma
10a5(mdo sde): skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'dod pa don du gnye rab ma yin pa'i phyir ro// bu mos smras pa/ 'di su zhi ga yin na/ 'di'i ming ci/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ 
10a6(mdo sde): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya'o// bu mos smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ji zhig yin/ de ci lha 'am/ 'on te klu 'am
10a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto phye chen po 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ 
10a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ji zhig yin/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni/ lha yang ma yin/ klu yang ma yin/ gnod sbyin yang ma yin
10b1(mdo sde): dri za yang ma yin/ lA ma yin yang ma yin/ na mkha' lding yang ma yin/ mi 'am ci yang ma yin/ lto phye chen po yang ma yin/ brgya byin yang ma yin/ tshangs pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten
10b2(mdo sde): bskyong ba yang ma yin/ rgyal po chen po yang ma yin te/ bu mo de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun yong su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 
10b3(mdo sde): 'di ni spangs du thams cad sbyin par byed de/ yongasu mi stong pa ji yang med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de nas bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ de skang grag pa las na
10b4(mdo sde): 'dis bdag la gos 'di sbyin par 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpalaM/ shing rta de las babs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
10b5(mdo sde): ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gang khyod kyi sku la gsol ba'i na bza' 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di yang smras so// gal
10b6(mdo sde): te khyod ni byang chub la yang zhugs gyur na// 'jam dbyangs na bza' 'di ni bdag la stsal du gsol// ser sna can gyi byang chub sems dpa' mi mdzes de// dper na chab dang bral ba'i
10b7(mdo sde): skams pa'i klung dang mtshungs// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te bu mo khyod ni byang chub zhugs gyur na// kho bos de ring gos 'di khyod la sbyin par bya// gang dag g.yo ba med par
10b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems la gnas// de dag 'di na lhar bcas 'jig rten mchod 'os yin// bu mos smras pa/ byang chub ces dgyi dri tshig gi don gang zhig lags// de ni gang las thob cing su
11a1(mdo sde): zhig stsol bar bgyid// tshogs rnams gang dag la ni nges par bsnyen bgyis pa// mkhas pa ma lags ma rtogs rnams kyis rtogs par 'gyur/ 
11a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo brjod pa med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag las rnam par grol ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma dag dang / 
11a3(mdo sde): bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba ni byang chub ces bya'o// de skad ces smras nas/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo do la 'di skad
11a4(mdo sde): ces smras so// sring mo khyod byang chub tu sems bskyed cig dang // ngas khyod la gos 'di sbyin no// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang lags/ 'jam dpal
11a5(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ sring mo khyed nyid byang chub yin no// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don de bang ga gis ma 'tshal na/ ji ltar bdag byang chub lags
11a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs pa de/ 'di skad du 'di ltar lus mnyam pa'i
11a7(mdo sde): kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis lus mnyam pa nyid do zhes chos ston to// sring me de'i phyir ngas khyed la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub po zhes smras so// 
11a8(mdo sde): sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mngon par grub pa yod dam/ de nas bu mo nges bstan pa 'di thos nas/ de sngoran gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu
11b1(mdo sde): 'thun pas/ chos la snang ba skyes par gyur te/ des snang ba thob nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jab dpal de ni de lta lags te/ bdag gi lus 'di la bung
11b2(mdo sde): bo dang / khabs dang / skye mched dag mngon par grub pa ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs la sems pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa yod dam/ 
11b3(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang mi sems shing / rnam par shes pa med de/ sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid
11b4(mdo sde): kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyi/ sa gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// 
11b5(mdo sde): sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sems pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa yod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam
11b6(mdo sde): dpal de ni ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang mi sems shing / rnam par shes pa med de/ sring mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
11b7(mdo sde): byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo
11b8(mdo sde): gzhan yang gzugs nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med par ram/ gzugs 'di sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ leng rgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi
12a1(mdo sde): dog sam/ yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gan ba zhes bstan par nus sam/ bums smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis
12a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med par ram/ byang chub de sngon po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ leb rgad nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam
12a3(mdo sde): yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/ sring mo de'i phyir/ gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs
12a4(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang
12a5(mdo sde): nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med par ram/ rnam par shes pa 'di sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ leb rgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam
12a6(mdo sde): yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhe sa bstan par nus sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang
12a7(mdo sde): nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med par ram/ byang chub de sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ leb rgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa
12a8(mdo sde): 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/ sring mo de'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa
12b1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gis las
12b2(mdo sde): skyes shing / yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci leg gis tha snyad btags pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir/ 
12b3(mdo sde): sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid kyis/ phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid do// sgyu ma ma nyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam
12b4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis/ sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid de/ srid mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ 
12b5(mdo sde): shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin yin pas/ shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir/ rmi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis/ phung po mnyam pa
12b6(mdo sde): nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ rmi lam mnyam pa nyid do// rmi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ rmi lam mnyam pa nyid de/ 
12b7(mdo sde): sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sdig rgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul pa'i las kyis bskyed pa'o// sring mo byang
12b8(mdo sde): chub kyang sdig rgyu'i rang bzhin te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa ring pal// sring me de'i phyir/ sdig rngu mnyam pa nyid kyi/ phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sdig rgyu nyam pa nyid do/ 
13a1(mdo sde): mu ma nam smram pa/ dri migagan yang zung ba ldan gzugs panas zun/ 'phob med pa'o// sring ma byang chub kya / gzugs brnyan gying bzhin te/ 'phob med pa'o// khring ma
13a2(mdo sde): byed/ gzugs parnyan mamam pa nyid kyis/ phung ba mnyam pa'i do// drang po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ gzugs parnyan mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs pa rnyan mjam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// 
13a3(mdo sde): byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ gzugs brnyan mnyam pa de nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byed chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni ming
13a4(mdo sde): tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'o// g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// 
13a5(mdo sde): phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid do// g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid de/ 
13a6(mdo sde): sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la byed pa po med de/ ma byas pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la ngo bo nyid med de
13a7(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la 'byung ba med de/ ma byung ba'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la rtag pa nyid med de/ mi rtag pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la
13b1(mdo sde): bde ba nyid med de/ sdug bsngal ba'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la sdug pa med de/ mi sdug pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la bdag med de bdag med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// 
13b2(mdo sde): sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la mngon par grub pa med de/ mngon par grub pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams ni dben pa ste/ dben pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la gzung ba
13b3(mdo sde): med de/ gzung ba med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la gzhi med de/ gzhi med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med de/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i don
13b4(mdo sde): ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams ni da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa ste/ da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa'i don ni byang chub bo// / sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams ni/ 'phags pa rnams
13b5(mdo sde): kyi tha snyad yin pas/ byang chub kyang 'phags pa rnam sa kyi tha snyad do// phung po rnams ni tha snyad med pa'i rang ba/ zhin te/ byang chub kyang tha snyad med pa'o// phung po lnga'i rang
13b6(mdo sde): bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas thug su chud pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/ de ni byang chub ces bya'o// sring mo de ltar na phung po lnga'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no// 
13b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/ sring mo phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa da ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/ 
13b8(mdo sde): sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin te/ phung po ma gtogs par yang
14a1(mdo sde): rtogs pa yang med la/ byang chub ma gtogs par yang rtogs pa med pas de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la
14a2(mdo sde): 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo rnam grangs 'dis na 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ji lta sems can thams cad byang chub tu gtogs pa ltar/ de gtogs pa med par
14a3(mdo sde): bstan pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyis lus 'di la/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / 
14a4(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / khams bzhi po de dag mngon par grub pa de la/ sring mo sa'i kham/ sa ni bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin
14a5(mdo sde): skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yino// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// de bzhin du chu'i kham
14a6(mdo sde): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can
14a7(mdo sde): ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// shin tu na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams dang / byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu med pa'i phyir chu'i
14a8(mdo sde): khams dang / byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir me'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu bstan tu med pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// 
14b1(mdo sde): sring so sa'i khams gang yin pa'i kha mra de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thug su chung // sring mo chu'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin ga/ 
14b2(mdo sde): pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugasu chud do// sring mo me'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thug su chud do// 
14b3(mdo sde): sring mo rlung gi khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thug su chud do// sring mo sa'i khams gtogs pa ni byang chub bo// srid
14b4(mdo sde): mo de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rtogs pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo
14b5(mdo sde): sa'i khams kyis chu'i khams yang dag par mi// shes so// chu'i khams kyis me'i khams yang dag par mi shes so// me'i khams kyis rlung gi khams yang dag par
14b6(mdo sde): mi shes so// sring mo de ltar na khams kyi ming yongasu shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de 'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras
14b7(mdo sde): so// sring mo gzhan yang gang khyod kyi lus 'di la mi mngon par grub pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par grub pa de la/ sring mo mig ni stong pa ste/ 
14b8(mdo sde): mig stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// rna ba ni stong pa ste/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sna ni stong pa ste/ sna stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// lce ni stong
15a1(mdo sde): ste/ lce stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// lus ni stong pa ste/ lus stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// yid ni stong pa ste/ yid stong pa nyid kyi
15a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugasu 'dogs par mi
15a3(mdo sde): byed de/ gzugs stong pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub bo// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos su 'dogs par mi byed de/ chos stong pa'i chos
15a4(mdo sde): kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo mi ga ni gzugs mi len te/ byang chub kyang gzugs mi
15a5(mdo sde): len to// rna ba ni sgra mi len te/ byang chub kyang sgra mi len to// / sna ni dri mi len te/ byang chub kyang dri mi len to// lce ni ro mi len to// byang chub kyang ro mi len to// 
15a6(mdo sde): lus ni reg bya mi len te/ byang chub kyang reg bya mi len to// yid ni chos mi len te/ byang chub kyang chos mi len to// sring mo de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gzugs dang bral ba ni/ byang chub bo// 
15a7(mdo sde): yid chos dang bral ba'i bar du yang / byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mtshams sbyor ba
15a8(mdo sde): med de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khamasu bral ba ni byang chub bo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / sgra'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba/ 
15b1(mdo sde): med de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sgra'i khamasu bral ba ni byang chub bo// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ dri'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ 
15b2(mdo sde): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / dri'i khamasu bral ba ni byang chub bo// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ ro'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lce'i rnam par shes
15b3(mdo sde): pa'i khams dang / ro'i khamasu bral ba ni byang chub bo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ reg bya'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
15b4(mdo sde): khams dang / reg pa'i khamasu bral ba ni byang chub bo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
15b5(mdo sde): khams dang / chos kyi khamasu bral ba ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang/ chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo de ltar na byang chub dang / 
15b6(mdo sde): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyi su med de/ gnyis su dbyer med do// byang chub dang / gzugs kyi khams de ni gnyis med de gnyi su dbyer med do// byang chub dang / 
15b7(mdo sde): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni/ gnyis su med de gnyisu dbyer med do// byang chub dang / yid kyi khams kyi bar du de ni gnyis med de gnyisu dbyer med do// byang chub dang chos kyi
15b8(mdo sde): khams de ni/ gnyi su med de gnyisu dbyer med do// byang chub dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyi su med de/ gnyisu dbyer med do// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad
16a1(mdo sde): du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang mig mi rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// de bzhin du rna pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtogs
16a2(mdo sde): ba ni byang chub bo// mig gi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa de
16a3(mdo sde): ni byang chub bo// sring mo mig gi rang bzhin ni ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / bral ba ni byang chub bo// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / 
16a4(mdo sde): yid kyi rang bzhin ni ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs pa ste/ de 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / bral ba ni byang chub bo// sring mo mig ni bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ 
16a5(mdo sde): yongasu 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongasu 'dzin pa med pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang
16a6(mdo sde): yid kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongasu 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa'o// sring mo mig ni skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med
16a7(mdo sde): kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// 
16a8(mdo sde): sring mo de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// 
16b1(mdo sde): sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du mig ni skyes pa yang ma yin/ 
16b2(mdo sde): bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo yid kyi bar du yang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo byang chudab kyang
16b3(mdo sde): skyes pa ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo de ltar mig gi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pas thug su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// yid kyi de bzhin nyid
16b4(mdo sde): kyi bar du yang de bzhin gshegs pas thug su chud de// de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// 
16b5(mdo sde): sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di ni bdag ma yin// sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ shed las skyes pa ma yin/ shed bu
16b6(mdo sde): ma yin/ byed pa po ma yin/ tshor ba po ma yin/ shes pa po ma yin/ mthong ba po ma yin/ nyan pa po ma yin/ sdom pa po ma yin/ zab po ma yin/ reg pa po ma yin/ rnam par
16b7(mdo sde): shes pa po ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin/ yongasu 'dzin pa ma yin/ 
16b8(mdo sde): byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra ma yin/ dri ma yin/ ro ma yin/ rig ma yin/ rnam par rig pa ma yin te/ sring mo de lta bas na chos thams cad mnyam pa
17a1(mdo sde): zhid ni byang chub ces bya'o// sring mo gang yang khyod kyi lus ni g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtag pa med pa ste/ rtswa dang / shing dang / shing ljon pa dang
17a2(mdo sde): rtsig pa'i tshogs rnams dang / khyad par med cing / tha dad du dbyer med do// sring mo gang yang nang gi sa'i khams dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gnyisu med cing / gnyisu dbyer med cing
17a3(mdo sde): gnyisu dbyer med de/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig par/ de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang / ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par thugasu chud de/ 
17a4(mdo sde): sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo// zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang sems dang yi nga dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis
17a5(mdo sde): sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa de ni// skra la gnas pa ma yin/ spu la gnas pa ma yin/ 
17a6(mdo sde): sha mdog la gnas pa ma yin/ lpags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ sha la gnas pa ma yin/ khrag la gnas pa ma yin/ rus pa la gnas pa ma yin/ chu ba la gnas pa ma
17a7(mdo sde): yin/ rkang la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi rol la gnas pa ma yin/ gnyi ga med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ mig la gnas pa ma yin/ rna ba la gnas
17a8(mdo sde): ba ma yin/ sna la gnas pa ma yin/ lce la gnas pa ma yin/ lus la gnas pa ma yin/ yid la gnas pa ma yin te/ gnas pa ma yin/ mi gnas pa ma yin/ rgyun cha
17b1(mdo sde): ma / su na padas pa ma'is dugs mas pa ma ngas gzugs sa ga ban myed pa/ rnam par dag pa med ga gsus pa ra pa/ 'dreb me ga gas pa gas
17b2(mdo sde): changag 'dagasal pa/ sems dang me kyirnam pa rig pa ni/ banas nyan sangs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pas/ den rang bzhin gyi rnam pa dun nga / 
17b3(mdo sde): la/ lus med pa'i phyir/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / rnam par dag pa med do// sring mo de ltar na rung po dang / khams dang / skyes ched kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub ga
17b4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams so// sring mo khyod kyi lus 'di la dung dang / khams dang / skye mched gang dag mngon par grub
17b5(mdo sde): pa de dag ni/ byang chub ste/ byang chub gzhan ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams las gzhan ma yin te/ de dag nyid
17b6(mdo sde): byang chub yin pas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni/ byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// 
17b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga 'bum gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
17b8(mdo sde): bskyed do// gang dag slang 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams las srog chags nyis brgyas kyang / 
18a1(mdo sde): ldan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa nga chub sems bskyed // lha dang ma dru rdzun pas rnams 'tsham byams rdul ma cing / drim dang bral ba
18a2(mdo sde): bar dag go// slang 'tshang ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal yang tsho shing mgul yid ngas te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde bskyes te/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tsha
18a3(mdo sde): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabasu song nas/ tshangs par sdud pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams
18a4(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye nga nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag
18a5(mdo sde): kyang / khyod kyi rjes su bstan pa dang / sems ca/ na thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcad pa dang / chos kyi gduci gcad ba dang
18a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi gdung mi gcad pa'i slad du/ khyod kyis bstan pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// de bzhin du chos rtogs par bgyi
18a7(mdo sde): ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad la chos bstan par yang bgyi'o// nyes par bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongasu spangs pa'i slad du/ nongs pa la nongs par bshags par
18a8(mdo sde): bgyi'o// gang na chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar ma rtogs nas/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyin ci log gi dbang du mchis pa dang / 
18b1(mdo sde): rang gi lus la mngon par zhen pas/ 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni/ chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ma rtogs so// 'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi/ 
18b2(mdo sde): 'on kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang / ldan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ji 'dra ba de nyid dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ldan
18b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'di la slob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ji ltar mchis pa
18b4(mdo sde): ma lags pa la/ kun brtags pa las 'byung bar de ltar kun brtags pa yongasu rtogs na/ 'gag par 'gyur bas gsog dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar
18b5(mdo sde): khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni rang bzhin ma mchis shing byung ba ma mchis pas sprin gyi tshogs dang 'dra'o// 
18b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni skad cig la 'jigs cing 'ju ste/ chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni shin tu mngon par grub pa/ ma mchis pa ste/ rlung dang
18b7(mdo sde): 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das te/ namakha'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ring du mi gnas pas chu'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// 
18b8(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i 'jug pa las 'byung ba ste/ gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ma mchis pa la phyin
19a1(mdo sde): ci log tu mthong ba las 'byung ba ste/ sprin mar dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni kun brtags pa las byung ba ste/ yang dag pa ma lags pa'o// 
19a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni ngar 'dzin pas lhag par chags pa dang 'brel pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag gir 'dzin pas/ dngos por yong su 'dzin pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni log
19a3(mdo sde): bas bskyed pas glo bur du byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa las byung bas/ mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams sna tshogs la mi dpyod
19a4(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ste/ so sor mi rtog pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems dang rjes su 'thun par bskyed pa ste/ nges par mi sems pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni
19a5(mdo sde): bdag dang / gzhan la mngon par zhen pa las byung ba ste// yid ches par mi bgyi ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po dag len pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams la
19a6(mdo sde): ril por 'dzin pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni skye mched rnams sogs pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ming dang gzugs la rnam par 'byed pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin
19a7(mdo sde): ma lags pa yid la bgying pa dag mi rtogs pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ byang chub kyi phung bu'i gzhi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 
19a8(mdo sde): byang chub ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyi sa bon te/ nyon mongs pa rtogs pa nyid byang chub lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub rdo rje'i
19b1(mdo sde): gzhi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa
19b2(mdo sde): rnams mthong ba ni byang chub ste/ byang chub ni yul thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam
19b3(mdo sde): par gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ skyes nas 'jig cing 'ju bas mi gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems kyi rang bzhin lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na
19b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal sems 'di ni/ chags pa 'am/ sdang ba 'am/ rmongs pa zhes/ sems kyi rang bzhin bstan par mi nus te/ 'jam dpal ji ltar sems bstan par mi nus pa de
19b5(mdo sde): bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang / yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin bstan par mi nus pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal
19b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de lta de ltar/ de 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyi ba la
19b7(mdo sde): skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la ma chags/ gti mug la spyod pa rnams la ma lags te/ cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyi ba la
19b8(mdo sde): skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi 'dod chags ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'dod chags la spyod pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal nga
20a1(mdo sde): ltar bdag gi zhe sdang ji blta ba de bzhin du/ zhe sdang la spyod pa thams cad kyi/ zhe sdang la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi gti mug ji lta
20a2(mdo sde): ba de bzhin du/ gti mug la spyod pa thams cad kyi/ gti mug la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa
20a3(mdo sde): thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni rtsa dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis
20a4(mdo sde): so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi me yang nyon mongs pa'i rtsa dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ 
20a5(mdo sde): dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ mun pa mun nag thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyang / nyon mongs
20a6(mdo sde): ba thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni shing ljon pa dang / ri thams cad la mi chags so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags
20a7(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i yul thams cad la mi chags so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha'i khams ni sreg pa'i
20a8(mdo sde): bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa'i sreg pa'i bskal
20b1(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ namakha' ni rdul dang / na bun dang / sprin thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal
20b2(mdo sde): de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ 
20b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' ni sa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi
20b4(mdo sde): gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper/ na/ khab long ni lcags dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i
20b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri khor yug ni rlung thams cad kyis bskyod
20b6(mdo sde): par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so// 'jam
20b7(mdo sde): dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba/ bya ngang pa zhes bgyi ba ni 'o ma dang chab bsres pa las/ 'o ma nyid ni 'tshal gyi chab ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal
20b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / nyon mongs pa dang 'dres pa dag las shes rab nyid ni len gyi nyon// 
21a1(mdo sde): sangs pa ni ma lag so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na/ nye dur 'brel ba'i bud med rnams la/ shing gi yal ga 'dud
21a2(mdo sde): bar mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ dbang po yongasu ma smin pa'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / 
21a3(mdo sde): ye shes 'dud par mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal bdag ni da ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ skrag pa ci yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal bdag
21a4(mdo sde): gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben par rtogs pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha bges pa ste/ 
21a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dgras 'jigs pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa de yang
21a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dgras bcom pa de ni dpa' bo mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis
21a7(mdo sde): bcom pa de yang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dang ces bgyi ba chab kyi nang du stsal na gsher bar yang mi
21a8(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / chab kyi dri mas kyang mi gos la/ chab kyi rnyog ma thams cad kyang rab tu dang bar bgyad ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la sbyong ba'i byang chub
21b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas kyang / nyon mongs pas gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kyang mi gos la/ nyon mongs pa'i rnyogs ma thams cad
21b2(mdo sde): kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas slang 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis bstan pa 'di bshad nas/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 
21b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba 'am
21b4(mdo sde): 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mong sa pa thams cad med pa zhes mi bya'o// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'bru mar gyi sgron ma la mun pa mun nag snang na/ 
21b5(mdo sde): de 'bru mar gyi sgron ma zhes mi bya'o// sring mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems
21b6(mdo sde): dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes mi bya'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ su gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mi mthong / rnam par byang ba yang mi mthong ste/ 
21b7(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par rig pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// sring mo gang dang gang du sems dang / yid dang / rnam par rig pa 'jug na/ 
21b8(mdo sde): tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems pa yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'o de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa med pa la ni sems sam/ sems la 'jug pa med pa'i// 
22a1(mdo sde): phyir te/ gang gis dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'i dmigs pa la sems 'jug pa de dag thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o// gang mngon par 'du byed
22a2(mdo sde): pa de ni 'khor ba'o// gang 'khor ba de ni 'du byed do// 'du byed thams cad ni 'khor ba ste/ sring mo de dag ni nyon mongs pa yin no// sring mo nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni sbyor ba ste/ 
22a3(mdo sde): mig dang gzugasu sbyor ba ni/ nyon mongs pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / sgra dang / dri dang / lce dang ro dang / lus dang reg bya dang / yid dang / chos su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// 
22a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la sbyor ba ni
22a5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'o// rab tu dben pa la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni/ rgyu ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so// 
22a6(mdo sde): de ni spros pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwag so// de ni rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwag so// de ni 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla drags te/ sring mo grangs dang / grangs med
22a7(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa nyid do// sring mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag la yang nyon mongs pa med la/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las kyang rab tu
22a8(mdo sde): thar par bya ba la yang shin tu brtson pa de ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar par byed pa ni/ 
22b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul lo// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul gang lags/ 'jam dpal gyis
22b2(mdo sde): sbas pa/ stong pa nyid la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / lta ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rjeb dang / mtshan ma med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjesu 'jug cing
22b3(mdo sde): mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / smon pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjesu 'jug cing / smon pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / 
22b4(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho med
22b5(mdo sde): ba la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / rga ba dang // shi bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjesu 'jug cing / 
22b6(mdo sde): skye ba dang / 'jig par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / nyan thos su nges pa la sau rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob pa las bzlog pa
22b7(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyasu nges pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjesu 'jug cing / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa so
22b8(mdo sde): sor rtog pa'i rjesu 'jug cing / sems can thams cad la yang snying rje ba ste/ sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ 
23a1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i rin po che chen po dag thogs ste ldog par ni dka'o// sring mo de bzhin du stong pa nyid la so sor rtag par ni sla'i
23a2(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / 
23a3(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa la yang so sor brtag par ni sla'i/ thabs la mkhas po dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o// sring mo 'di lta ste
23a4(mdo sde): dper na/ g.yul ngo chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i/ ma smas ma nyams par rgyal ba ni dka'o// sring mo de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du 'jug par sla'i/ thabs la mkhas
23a5(mdo sde): pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o// bu mos smras pa// 'jam dpal thabs shes bgyi ba ji lta bu lagasapa/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo thabs shes
23a6(mdo sde): bya ba ni/ gang phyogs gnyis mi spong ba ste/ 'di ltar 'khor ba'i phyogs dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogaso// sring mo thabs shes bya ba/ gang sgo gnyis ston par byed pa
23a7(mdo sde): ste/ 'khor ba'i sgo dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dang / stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang / lta ba las rab tu thar pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma las rnam par
23a8(mdo sde): thar pa'i sgo dang / smon pa med pa'i sgo dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba'i sgo dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang / dge ba mngon du 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / skye ba med pa'i sgo dang / 
23b1(mdo sde): skye ba kun tu ston pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgo dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi sgo dang / skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa'i sgo dang / skye ba dang / 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 
23b2(mdo sde): bden pa'i sgo dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i sgo dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos thams cad so sor srung ba'i sgo dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang / byang chub
23b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo dang / rang byang chub kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mi brjed pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang sgo gnyis nye bar ston kyang sgo
23b4(mdo sde): thams cad la yang chags pa med pa de ni thabs mkha sa pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi sgo dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang / zhe sdang gi sgo dang / 
23b5(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgo dang / gti mug gi sgo dang / gti mug dang bral ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bral ba'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams
23b6(mdo sde): cad kyi sgo dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / slob pa dang / 
23b7(mdo sde): mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo gang yin pa/ de gnyi ga shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
23b8(mdo sde): la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// // bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma// yang de'i tshe na/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ngos kyi sman ldong zhig na/ 
24a1(mdo sde): zha 'bring byed pa'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang gcig tu ring du 'chags pas/ 'chag cing bzhug so// der bzhugs nas/ bcom
24a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul dang / thabs la mkhas pa ji skad bstan pa de
24a3(mdo sde): ni de bzhin te/ leg so legaso zhes bya ba byin pa dang / leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs kyis go bar gyur cing
24a4(mdo sde): leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra de nyid kyis/ stong gsu dam gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par yang gyur nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
24a5(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
24a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag/ legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra des bskul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag
24a7(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci 'am ci
24a8(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
24b1(mdo sde): 'das legaso zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis su la stsal/ bcom ldan
24b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'o// lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nga lta
24b3(mdo sde): ga na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i shar phyogs kyi sgo na/ smad 'tshong ma'i
24b4(mdo sde): bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba dang / lhan cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug gis/ lha'i bu dag gang dag chos nyan par 'dod pa dag kyang der deng
24b5(mdo sde): shig/ de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am dong / lho phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang
24b6(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / lus rags par sprul
24b7(mdo sde): nas/ me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/ me tog gi char des rgyal po'i khab kyi kho ra khor yug tu/ me tog gi chal par bkram par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyis kyang mi rnams mdzan
24b8(mdo sde): zhing / mi rnams kyis kyang lha rnams mthong ste/ phan tshun sla ba mi byed do// de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag/ me tog de dag
25a1(mdo sde): gis kyang bskul/ lha'i lus rags pa de dag gis kyang bskul nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgra
25a2(mdo sde): yang bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon
25a3(mdo sde): nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas/ 'khor de dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / blon po dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gi bu rnams kyis
25a4(mdo sde): smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de/ 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs par kun nas ldang ba dang bral te/ dbang po dang spyod lam rab tu zhi zhing
25a5(mdo sde): dbang po mi g.yeng la/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / dpal gyis legs par brgyan par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de la phyin chad su yang 'dod pa'i rnam par
25a6(mdo sde): rtog pa mi skye bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po de 'dus par rig nas/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal
25a7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo skye bo'i tshigs thams cad kyis khyod mthong yang / phyir zhing chags pa med na/ khyod kyis nyon mongs pa de dag gang du bzhag
25a8(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ye shes dang rnam par grol ba la gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas
25b1(mdo sde): pa ste/ de dag kyang ma bskyed pa dang / ma bkag pa dang / ma bsgyur bar de ltar bdag gis rtog so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang lags pa de yang bdag gi
25b2(mdo sde): rtogs lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal rtog pa ma mchis shing
25b3(mdo sde): rnam par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lag so// tshul bzhin ma lags pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin
25b4(mdo sde): lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni blo bur te/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// mtshan ma med pa drang / smon pa med pa'i shes pa dang lhan cig
25b5(mdo sde): mi gnas so// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang ldan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ dug drag pa'i sbrul gdug pas bltas
25b6(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis/ skye bo 'gum par 'gyur ba las/ der mi zhig gis dug thams cad 'jil ba dang / dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i sman gnod sel ces bgyi ba 'tshal
25b7(mdo sde): te mchis nas/ de nas sman de bstan ma thag tu sbrul gdug pa'i dug de ma mchis par bgyis nas/ de la khye'u dang bu mo rnams brde bas rtse zhing / khye'u dang bu mo de dag sprul
25b8(mdo sde): gdug pa de dang lhan cig du rtse bar bgyid de/ bde par len cing gro la se ral 'phreng du btags ste/ rgyan du bgyis kyang tshig par mi bgyid/ za bar mi bgyid/ sdug bsngal du mi
26a1(mdo sde): bgyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bdag kyang sngon chos 'dul ba pa thos pa na/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa byin ci log la nye ba gnas pa'i
26a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pas yongasu bsregs pa na/ 'dod chags kyis rang gi lus la chags shing / rang gi gzugs la mngon par zhen te/ gzugs dbu ba lta bur so sor rtog par mi bgyid/ 
26a3(mdo sde): lus sgyu ma'i chos nyid du 'tshal/ dga' ba'i rtsed mo rmi lam lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i ro myang ba sbrang rtsi'i thig pa lta bur ma 'tshal/ srog gi dbang po zil pa'i thigs
26a4(mdo sde): ba lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par ma 'tshal/ lus mi sdug par ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad shin tu sdug bsngal bar ma 'tshal cing / chos thams
26a5(mdo sde): cang bdag ma mchis par so sor rtog par mi bgyid de/ bdag kyang mun pa mun nag gis bsgribs shing / gzhan la yang mun par bgyid/ bdag kyang bcings shing
26a6(mdo sde): gzhan la yang bcings par bgyid pa las/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe/ bdag gis khyod las chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid thos te/ thos nas kyang mos shing / mos nas kyang rnam par
26a7(mdo sde): grol te/ de'i slad du bdag da ltar dang / sman ma chag pa'i mig gis/ su la yang blta bar mi bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal snang ba ni mun pa dang / lhan cig mi gan so// 
26a8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba ni su yang nyon mongs pa rnams la chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ smang 'tshong
26b1(mdo sde): ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis/ 'di skad ces smraso// kye ma 'jam dpal lnga'i 'khor dang / mi'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus kyis/ gang gis lha dang mi 'di dag gis/ 
26b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de dag rtogs nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi
26b3(mdo sde): bka' mching bgyid par khyod spobs pa mdzod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin la ni mos par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo nyon mong/ 
26b4(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin ni/ byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ma sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yod/ 
26b5(mdo sde): su ma rtags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang
26b6(mdo sde): yongasu rtags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na me ni rgyu yod na 'bar ro// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i
26b7(mdo sde): rgyu yid na/ khams gsum du 'bar ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni rgyu med na mi 'bar ro// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu med
26b8(mdo sde): na/ khams gsum du mi 'bar ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ lo stong du 'bar ba'i me la ni skye ba dang 'bri ba med do// sring mo de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong du
27a1(mdo sde): rgyu ba'i nyon mongs pa la yang / skye ba dang 'bri ba med do// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me shi ba la ni me zhes mi gdag so// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs
27a2(mdo sde): par shes pa zhi ba la yang / nyon mongs pa zhes mi gdag so// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' gang la me 'bar yang / nam mkha' ni me des tshig par mi nus so// 
27a3(mdo sde): sring mo de bzhin du gang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la/ blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa byang yang / rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba de ni/ blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa des/ kun nas nyon mongs
27a4(mdo sde): par byed mi nus so// sring mo 'di ltar yang gzugs/ kyi lus la ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mtsho bran gyi chab kyi nang gi chu zla
27a5(mdo sde): bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo phung po rnams ji ltar lta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul
27a6(mdo sde): ba bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khams rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ khams gsum bskal pa'i mes bsregs par
27a7(mdo sde): gyur pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo skye mched drug rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i las
27a8(mdo sde): mngon par 'dus ma bgyid pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ 'khor 'od ni steng gi
27b1(mdo sde): namakha'i mtshams bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod nyid ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ bdag pha ma gnyis phrad pa bzhin du'o// 
27b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo nga ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ long ba gzugs la ji lta ba bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
27b3(mdo sde): bu mo khyod kyis 'di dag thos sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ sbrum sprul pa'i rna ba'i rnam par rig pa lta bus thos lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
27b4(mdo sde): bu mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/ bu mos spras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag nyi nga byang chub lags te/ yang 'dod par mi bgyid do// 
27b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam da pal bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan du
27b6(mdo sde): yongasu btang bas spyad lagaso// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 
27b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal na mkha' yongasu rdzogs pas/ yongasu rdzogs par bgyis lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms sam/ 
27b8(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pas bsgoms lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis brtson
28a1(mdo sde): 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa brtsams sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thob par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ 'arnams pa
28a2(mdo sde): so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi dbyings gnas pa ma mchis
28a3(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis/ bdag gnas lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal
28a4(mdo sde): lhag chad ma mchis par yongasu rdzogs par bgyis lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis byams pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'dza pal sems can thams
28a5(mdo sde): cang ni mi srid pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i snying chen po gang nas btsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 
28a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las btsal bar bgyi 'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te sems can
28a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal
28a8(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang las rtsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems lagaso// 'jam dpal gyis
28b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ci zhig byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ni/ sems can thams cad mi slu ba yongasu rdzogs
28b2(mdo sde): bar bgyid pa dang / chos thams cad la 'gal ba ma mchis par nye bar mchi bar bgyid pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'gal ba zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos
28b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ gang dag ma mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i slad du byang chub la rab tu zhugs pa dag go/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ de dag gang dang 'gal/ bu mo smras
28b4(mdo sde): ba/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang ngo // 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ bu mo phas kyi rgol ba dag gang yin/ bu mo sa smras pa/ gang dag bzod pa'i rlom sems
28b5(mdo sde): kyis gzhan la rgol ba dag lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba ga las 'ong / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gyis tho
28b6(mdo sde): btsam pa las mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tho ba tsam pa ma mchis na/ bzod pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'jam dpal gang la sems can gang gis tho brtsams
28b7(mdo sde): ba na/ 'khrug pa ma mchis shing / gnod pa mi bgyid pa de/ bzod pa bsgom pa lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khong khro ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos
28b8(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis bskal pa brgyar brtsegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la gnod par bgyid pa de ni khong khro ba zhes bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
29a1(mdo sde): bu mo bzong pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu rin/ du mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi sems lazhe 'gras pa ma mchis shing / yul thams cad la gnang
29a2(mdo sde): mi bya ba ste/ nga ni bzod pa lags par rig par brtsi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 
29a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gang chos thams cad la rnam par 'byed kyang mi dmigs pa lagaso// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom
29a4(mdo sde): ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid kyang / nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'dzem dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni phung
29a5(mdo sde): bo rnams kyang ston kyang / phung po'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa rnams ston kyang / 
29a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin chos nyid kyis chags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rga ba dang / 'chi ba ston kyang / 
29a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho dang / 'gro ba ma mchis par rab tu rtogs pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni lha'i bu dag ston kyang / phrag dog dang / rlom sems
29a8(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can yongasu smin par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub
29b1(mdo sde): sems dpas shes rab dang / bangs 'ong su sgom pas/ sems can yangasu smin par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpas ji ltar sengs can
29b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang gi sems dang shes pa yongasu sgom pas/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems can thams cad kyi drung du
29b3(mdo sde): gnas par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ni khyod la chos nyan par 'dod do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang du bdag dang / gzhan du shes
29b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa de ni/ nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags la/ gang la/ rna ba'i rnam par rig pas/ rnam par shes pa jug na yang / nyan par mtshal ba ma lag so// 'jam
29b5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos nyan par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi lus la rmi lam gyi mi lta bur mos pa dang / 
29b6(mdo sde): ston pa'i chos de la yang brag cha'i sgra skad lta bur mos shing mos pa dang / rnam par grol ba yang / gnyisu mi bgyid pa de tsam gyis na/ chos nyan par 'tshal ba lagaso// 
29b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos ji ltar mnyan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ chos la ston pa nan tan bgyid pas/ chos mnyan par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
29b8(mdo sde): nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i shes rab kyis slad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na
30a1(mdo sde): 'khor de las srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba
30a2(mdo sde): sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i lha dang mi lnga brgya ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing
30a3(mdo sde): dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// bu mo de yang chos nyan pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas/ chos rnams la rjesu 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bzod pa
30a4(mdo sde): thob nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ 'jam dpal thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag rab tu 'byung du gsal/ tshul bzhin ma lag
30a5(mdo sde): pa kun bskyed pa/ 'phags pa ma lags ba/ 'phags pa'i chos las nyams par bgying pa'i lus 'di lus 'di las thar par mdzad du gsol zhes rab tu
30a6(mdo sde): dbyung bar gsol ba btab bo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo 'di lta ste/ mgo'i skra 'dreg pa de de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
30a7(mdo sde): zhe na/ bu mo gang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gcad pa'i phyir brtson pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro// bu mo gang gos ngur sdig 'chang
30a8(mdo sde): ba da ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bu mo gang bdag nyid kyang bslab pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs la/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems
30b1(mdo sde): can rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / brtul zhugs la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo gang bdag nyid
30b2(mdo sde): dben par gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bu mo gang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na rnam par drug pa'i sems can rnams dben par shes pa la
30b3(mdo sde): 'god par byed pa de/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// kha dog dang / gzugs kyi rnags dang / spyod lam gyi dbyings ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung
30b4(mdo sde): ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dag la byams pa dang / snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi dge
30b5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems nga ba'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu
30b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba yin no// bdag yongasu mya ngan le sa 'da' ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan yong
30b7(mdo sde): su mya ngan las bzla ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems
30b8(mdo sde): dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi sems rjes srung ba ni// 
31a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rjes su srung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin
31a2(mdo sde): no// bdag thar par bya ba la brtson pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad thar par bya ba la brtson pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab
